data.meta_description: Marty Sveinbjornson began his career as a #carpenter over 30 years ago. Before he could even drive, he was taking part in the construction of schools, credit‚Ä¶
data.text:
Congratulations to the Town of Canora and Canora Leisure Services on the Grand Opening of your new Aquatic Park. üí¶ Our team enjoyed working with you on the construction of the Pool Building and wish the community many fun pool days ahead! ‚òÄÔ∏è We know this facility will be enjoyed by many residents and visitors for years to come! If you haven‚Äôt checked it out yet, you definitely need to! üëç Canora Aquatic Park On behalf of the entire team at SveinCo, thank you for choosing us to be a part of your project!

Wanna Work With Us? üòé We have a busy construction year coming up so we are looking to add a few more team members to our awesome crews. üôå We have framers, carpenter helpers, Journeyman, finishers and cabinet makers that make up our diverse team to provide our clients a one-stop-shop for everything they may need for their new build or major renovation project. If you are motivated with a positive attitude, we are looking for you! ü´µ We understand that starting with a new company or beginning a new career is a big decision, but we are confident you will be surrounded with a great bunch that support and work together to create extraordinary results. Our reputation is only as good as the people who represent our SveinCo brand of quality, professionalism and team work ~ and we have to say, we have pretty great people!ü§ó Want to be part of it? Email or come on down to our 7th Avenue shop location. Let‚Äôs chat! 1) Framers (Journeyman and/or Apprentice) 2) Finishers (installation of doors, trim, millwork, flooring, etc) 3) General Labourers (roofing, siding) 4) Project Support (experience with AutoCAD, drafting and/or estimating software) 5) Summer Students (General Labourer or AutoCAD/Drafter, Social Media) Discover All the Possibilities with SveinCo! #sveinco #team #hiring #awesome #discover #career #yorkton #quality #reputation #CORcertified #BuildRight #BuildSveinCo #construction #work #experience #people #project #teamwork

Are you considering a major ADDITION, RENOVATION or NEW commercial build? Choosing a General Contractor with a professional reputation and a complete range of services will help you save time, money, and stress. SveinCo Developments takes care of the construction process so you can focus on what you are good at ~ running your business! As a full-service General Contractor, we work with engineers, city & rural inspectors, sub-trades, suppliers, etc, to assist and guide you through the building process. Let us make your business renovation or new commercial build a success. You are in good hands with SveinCo Developments #BuildRight #BuildSveinCo
